Person Early College for Innovation and Leadership and Wake STEM Early College, in collaboration with the Friday Institute PBI Global Team, are hosting our second Global Service Learning Showcase! This is a large problem-based learning endeavor by both schools' 9th-grade groups and teacher teams. Each group has an Advocacy presentation in the auditorium at PCC and a Tradeshow booth in S100 at PCC. The tradeshow experience provides a one-on-one interaction with the student teams where they explain their research process and possibly showcase their products for clean and sanitary water and another UN Sustainable goal.

Once the showcase ends, it becomes a school-wide project in that all PECIL students will participate in the Pledge walk where they walk with gallons of water simulating the experience of the characters in the book "Long Walk to Water". They are hoping to raise more than they did last year in order to help build another well in the South Sudan.

Tonight the Lady Rockets will play in the 3rd round of the 3A State Volleyball Playoffs at Person High School!

Admission to the game is $7.00 for all who attend. We encourage children to wear costumes and with PAID admission candy will be passed out by coaches, staff, and players.
